In England, in the seven days to 13 October, there were 239,760 new confirmed cases (424.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 October, there were 196,990 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 22% (42,770 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 October is 7,226,658 (12,779.2 cases per 100,000 population).
